text: Mba ra ndai fhain kega zegi gumgi, mbe taagia vegim, Guma Bakɨme maan rɨman Zosep kharigi. Ana wo enser mbe sarigim, ana zav khaŋ Zosep ga nzuai, “Ndu khavgip, kha tara ndigip, ana niamuun kov nde rɨɨv Idzɨvan ŋgegɨri. Ndu ŋgɨgɨp, Idzɨvra kɨri, ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Herot mba tara ndiv ganɨv, ana shogirim, ana rɨmɨn za mbui.”
